ygData.msgSnippet: What was the one bard issue that got resolved? Galtin of E ci ... From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@sba.uwm.edu] Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 3:52 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
What was the one bard issue that got resolved?

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 3:52 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] gordon answers


Clipped:

Bard Bugs/Not a Whine (v2000.05.22) - long
Abashi/Brad/Gordon, I have compiled a list of all bard bugs to date for your
review and comments. Sorry this is so long, but there are a lot of bugs.

(his answer)

I apologize but it is taking a bit longer than I'd hoped to look into these
issues. As some will notice, at least one issue has been resolved with
another being considered publicly.

I'll get back with you soon.

Just one note, has anyone tried the two psalms mentioned recently? Just a
few weeks ago a bug was corrected that was causing secondary effects on bard
songs to fail.

-Gordon



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
